object.name: vehicle_card
object.property: <model xmlns:i18n="http://xml.zope.org/namespaces/i18n" xmlns:security="http://namespaces.plone.org/supermodel/security" xmlns:lingua="http://namespaces.plone.org/supermodel/lingua" xmlns:marshal="http://namespaces.plone.org/supermodel/marshal" xmlns:form="http://namespaces.plone.org/supermodel/form" xmlns="http://namespaces.plone.org/supermodel/schema"> <schema> <field name="title" type="zope.schema.TextLine"> <description/> <title>Name</title> </field> <field name="image" type="plone.namedfile.field.NamedBlobImage"> <description/> <required>False</required> <title>Image</title> </field> <field name="of_passengers" type="zope.schema.Choice"> <description/> <title># of passengers</title> <values> <element>1</element> <element>2</element> <element>4</element> <element>8</element> </values> </field> <field name="properties" type="zope.schema.Set"> <description/> <title>Properties</title> <value_type type="zope.schema.Choice"> <values> <element>Gas</element> <element>Diesel</element> <element>Van</element> <element>Caravan</element> <element>Cabriolet</element> </values> </value_type> </field> </schema> </model>
